data.name: Devilian - Blasphemous Pack
data.detailed_description:
You don't have to sell your soul to unleash your potential as a Devilian! This treasure trove contains a terrifying bear mount, as well as patron time, blessings, talismans, and more!

15-day Patron Access

Gain 25% more EXP, earn special daily rewards, access your Warehouse anywhere, and more!

20 Enigma Keys

Unlock Enigma Boxes and claim the treasures within

Nightmare Ursus Mount

Ride a nightmarish bear into battle

2 7-day Elara's Blessings

Earn 50% more XP and Devil Souls

2 7-day Aira's Blessings

Get better drops in Infinite Hunting Grounds

2 Sacrificial Talisman Boxes

Grants Sacrificial Talismans when opened

Furious Jirah Talisman

Earn 5% more XP and 2.5% more Gold in Dungeons

Benevolent Tempera Talisman

Earn 10% more XP and Gold in the Abyssal Tower

data.short_description: You don't have to sell your soul to unleash your potential as a Devilian! This treasure trove contains a terrifying bear mount, as well as patron time, blessings, talismans, and more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GTX / AMD HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph client and registered Trion Worlds account
